"That should be all of them.": "...Now, you wanted to know why we don't use the power of song?"
"For generations, the heads of the Retem region have fought with both the power of war, and of song. And yet..."
"Nadereh does not possess the power of song."
"On the day she took the mantle of leader... there were many ARKS gathered here."
"Nadereh sang her battle song that day. But its power never manifested."
"All who had gathered were shaken, but it was Nadereh who took it the hardest."
"And yet, she performed her duties to her utmost."
"She strengthened herself in the ways of war beyond all others... Enough to surpass her lack of song."
"There is not a soul among us who could praise her strength while disparaging her lack of singing prowess."
"...Would there happen to be any data regarding Nadereh's power of song?"
"For example, battle records... Or anyone's research data..."
"If it's not too much to ask, I would like to review any such information."
"Hm... There may be something left in Retem City's terminals..."
